thread.title: Germania colloca 801 mln euro in riapertura bond 2026 indicizzato Bond |

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Germania colloca 801 mln euro in riapertura bond 2026 indicizzato Bond |
text: BERLINO, 6 Germany's Finance Agency, the federal government's debt management office, sold 0.801 billion euros in a top up of its 0.10 percent, 2026 inflation-linked bond (linker) at the lowest price of 108.52, the Bundesbank said on Tuesday. The linker (ISIN:DE0001030567) are due to mature on April 15, 2026. The settlement date is Feb 08. Results of Oct 10 sale included for reference: AUCTION DATE 06/02/18 10/10/17 AVG. YIELD -0.9 pct -1.04 pct AVG. ACCEPTED PRICE 108.54 110.18 LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE 108.52 110.16 TAIL 0.02 0.02 TOTAL BIDS 1.299 bln euros 1.516 bln euros ALLOTTED 0.801 bln euros 0.799 bln euros RETAINED 199.5 mln euros 201 mln euros BID COVER RATIO 1.6 1.9 TOTAL VOLUME 13.0 bln euros 12.0 bln euros Auction details in German can be found at . ((Berlin newsroom; Tel: +49 30 2888 5142; Email: berlin.econ@news.reuters.com) Keywords: GERMANY LINKER/
